title: Australian diary. No. 007
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: British migrants are welcomed to their new homes; in particular tradespeople arriving in Australia. Australian designers show their talents by designing garments in local wool and cotton and parading them in a Sydney department store. Ex-servicemen and women form a musical society - Melbourne services Commemoration Musical Society. Nicotine sulphate made fromplants grown in Victoria is extracted by scientists to form an insecticide to protect other plants. Surf Life Saving Clubs from around Australia compete at the national Cahmpionships held in Southport, Queensland.
